bwwExcerpt: The subjects of race, female empowerment, and the fleeting nature of fame are all touched upon, but often glancingly, and fleshed-out characters are thin on the ground...If you are looking for a night out that is easy on the ear and the brain then, baby, Baby It's You is for you. (B-)
